short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds bicycling layers to Redfin so you can buy a house you can bike home to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking at the housing market but wishing you could see existing bike routes to help guide your decision?  This simple Chrome extension does one thing and one thing only: after it's installed, when you view the map search on Redfin, the bicycling layer of Google Maps will be displayed.  Now you can see bike lanes, greenways, safe streets, slow streets, and other factors that you can take into consideration when looking at different neighborhoods on Redfin.

This extension is not in any way affiliated with Redfin.
